bs-pageassignments-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of page assignments extension
pageassignments:
Special page name for page assignments. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
{{Identical|Assignment}}
managepageassignments: Special page name for page assignments manager. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-text: Label for global actions menu. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-pref-assignedusersadd: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for additional permissions:
bs-pageassignments-dlg-title:
Window title of dialog. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
{{Identical|Assignment}}
bs-pageassignments-dlg-fldlabel:
Window field label. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
{{Identical|Assignment}}
bs-pageassignments-menu-label:
Label text for action menu entry that allows setting page assignments. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
{{Identical|Set page assignments}}
bs-pageassignments-action-apiedit-descri:
Client-side API module description for BS.PageAssignments.action.ApiTaskEdit to edit an assignment. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

Parameters:
*$1 - Page title
bs-pageassignments-column-title:
Grid column label for Pagetitle
{{Identical|Page title}}
bs-pageassignments-column-assignments:
Grid column label for assignments. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
{{Identical|Assignment}}
bs-pageassignments-column-assignedto:
Grid column label for Assigned to
{{Identical|Assigned to}}
bs-pageassignments-no-assignments: Text, when no assignments could be found. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-action-log: Tooltip text to the link to the assignments log. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-action-delete-confirm: For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-api-error: Text, that an error has occurred
bs-pageassignments-api-error-no-page: Error message, that the given parameter pageId was not a valid page
bs-pageassignments-api-error-insert:
Error message, that the assigmnment could not be saved. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

Parameters:
*$1 - Assignee ID
*$2 - Page title
log-name-bs-pageassignments: Used in [[Special:Log]], label for page assignments log. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
log-description-bs-pageassignments: Used in [[Special:Log]], log description for page assignments. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
logeventslist-bs-pageassignments-log: Option label for the assignments log on [[Special:Log]]. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
logentry-bs-pageassignments-add-user:
Log message, that someone assigned a page to a user. Parameter:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that assigned the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that assigned the page
*$3 - Page title
*$4 - the name of the user, that got assigned to the page
logentry-bs-pageassignments-remove-user:
Log message, that someone removed the assignment for a page from a user. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that removed the assignment
*$2 - Name of the user, that removed the assignment of the page
*$3 - Page title
*$4 - the name of the user, the assigmnet got removed from
logentry-bs-pageassignments-add-group:
Log message, that someone assigned a group to a page. Parameter:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that assigned the page
*$2 - Name of the user, that assigned the page
*$3 - Page name
*$4 - Group name
logentry-bs-pageassignments-remove-group:
Log message, that someone removed the assignment for a group from a page. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

Parameter:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that removed the assignment
*$2 - Name of the user, that removed the assignment
*$3 - Page name
*$4 - Group name
logentry-bs-pageassignments-add-speciale:
Log message, that someone assigned everyone to a page. Parameter:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that performed the assignment
*$2 - Name of the user, that performed the assignment
*$3 - Page name
logentry-bs-pageassignments-remove-speci:
Log message, that someone deleted the assignment of everyone to a page. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

Parameters:
*$1 - Real name of the user, that performed the assignment
*$2 - Name of the user, that performed the assignment
*$3 - Page name
echo-category-title-bs-pageassignments-a: Label for action messages, used in [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo]]. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-pageassignments-act: Tooltip for Echo notification category bs-pageassignments-action-cat. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-notification-reason: Text of mail introduction - Label of a following list.
bs-pageassignments-notification-reason-u: User is directly assigned to a page. Item in a list of reasons, why the user gets a assignment notification.
bs-pageassignments-notification-reason-g:
User is a member of one or more groups. Item in a list of reasons, why the user gets an assignment notification. Parameters:
*$1 - Number of groups
*$2 - Group name or comma-separated list of group names
prefs-pageassignments: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for page assignments section in preferences. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-pref-lockdowngroups: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label text for groups that get locked down for a page when the user is not assigned
bs-pageassignments-yourassignments: Headline text for your assignments. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-yourassignmentsdesc: Description text for list of pages which you are assigned to.
action-pageassignable:
Describes the permission that a user needs to have to be listed as assignable user
{{doc-action|pageassignable}}
right-pageassignable:
Describes the permission that a user needs to have to be listed as assignable user
{{doc-right|pageassignable}}
action-pageassignments:
Describes the permission that a user needs to change assignments of a page. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

{{doc-action|pageassignments}}
right-pageassignments:
Describes the permission that a user needs to change assignments of a page. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

bs-pageassignments-assignee-special-ever:
Label for combobox list entry that assignes all users to a certain page
{{Identical|Everyone}}
bs-pageassignments-assignee-type-everyon:
Label for the assignee type everyone
{{Identical|Everyone}}
bs-pageassignments-assignee-type-user:
Label for the assignee type user
{{Identical|User}}
bs-pageassignments-assignee-type-group:
Label for the assignee type group
{{Identical|Group}}
bs-pageassignments-secure-nsm-label:
Used in [[Special:NamespaceManager]] of extension BlueSpiceNamespaceManager.
Label for column header in ExtJS grid panel.
For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-secure-lockdown-reaso:
Used to describe that the requested permission for this page is only available for assignees.
* $1 - Name of the requested action
* $2 - Number of assignees
* $3 - Comma-separated list of assignees, that are assigned to this page
bs-pageassignments-group-lockdown-reason:
Used to describe to the user, that the requested permission for the page is only available when the user is assigned to it.
* $1 - Name of the Page
bs-pageassignments-privacy-transparency-:
Message for item in BlueSpicePrivacy when exporting user assignments on a page. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

* $1 - conflated list of pages user is assigned to
* $2 - number of pages user is assigned to
bs-pageassignments-collection-type-assig:
Label for source type “assignedpages” in entry field “type”. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

{{Identical|Assignments}}
bs-pageassignments-pageheader-label: Label for list with assignments in page header. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-dialog-input-placehol: Placeholder for assignment lookup field. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignment-info-dialog:
Label for page in page information dialog. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

{{Identical|Assignment}}
bs-pageassignments-statistics-report-ass: Label for axis of statistics report about number of assigned pages
bs-pageassignments-notification-pagerevi:
Notification summary that describes who approved what page.
* $1 - username of the user that approved the page.
* $3 - Name of the page, that was approved

Notification subject that describes, what page was approved.
* $2 - Name of the page, that was approved

Notification body that describes, who approved what page.
* $1 - username of the user that approved the page.
* $2 - name of the page, that was approved
bs-pageassignments-notification-ui-subsc: Label for the Notifications subscription set
bs-pageassignments-event-assignment-add-: Notification title label. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-event-assignment-add:
Notification message user is assigned to a page. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

* $2 - page anchor
bs-pageassignments-event-assignment-add-:

* $1 - page anchor
bs-pageassignments-event-assignment-link: Notification email link intro message. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
bs-pageassignments-event-assignment-remo: Notification title label. For the context in which to translate “assignment”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments

bs-pageassignments-books-overview-page-b: Label for action button to change assignments. For the context in which to translate “assign”, see: https://en.wiki.bluespice.com/wiki/Manual:Extension/BlueSpicePageAssignments
